io.divide.otto

Annotation Type Produce


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Produce
    Marks a method as an instance producer, as used by AnnotatedHandlerFinder and Bus.

    Otto infers the instance type from the annotated method's return type. Producer methods may return null when there is no appropriate value to share. The calling Bus ignores such returns and posts nothing.
